sentences.sContent: I had some ginger powder in the house, so I tried it with the larvae.
sentences.sContent_eng: I had some ginger powder in the house, so I tried it with the larvae.
sentences.sCn: 我家里有些生姜粉，所以我就拿来试探这些幼虫。

sentences.sContent: Because one way ladybugs compete is by consuming the eggs and larvae of rival species.
sentences.sContent_eng: Because one way ladybugs compete is by consuming the eggs and larvae of rival species.
sentences.sCn: 因为瓢虫的一种竞争手段是吃对手的卵或者幼虫。

sentences.sContent: We know that freshwater eels reproduce in the ocean because larvae have been found drifting near the surface thousands of miles from any shore.
sentences.sContent_eng: We know that freshwater eels reproduce in the ocean because larvae have been found drifting near the surface thousands of miles from any shore.
sentences.sCn: 我们知道淡水鳗鱼在海里繁殖，因为我们曾经在距所有海岸数千英里的海面发现过漂动的鳗鱼幼体。
